products.title: Rimini (Blackout), Primrose - Roller Blind
products.description: The rimini (blackout) in primrose combines a best-in-class light-controlling blackout fabric with a rich, vivid yellow colouring; perfect for bringing the feel of sunshine in even when you need to block it out. This primrose colouring will brighten up any room. Consider the rimini in primrose as an addition to a white or pastel coloured landing or hallway, to add a splash of colour without the need to totally redecorate.

products.title: Trinity (Blackout), Blush Pink - Roller Blind
products.description: Who doesn't love a touch of blush pink? It's the natural shade that reminds you of home and welcomes you through the door the moment you take out your keys. If you love subtle colour that adds depth and clarity then you need look no further. When you want to add something a little more gentle to your window spaces that disperses natural colour around the room there's perhaps no better choice than trinity (blackout) blush pink.

products.title: Trinity (Blackout), Soft Pink - Roller Blind
products.description: True to its name, trinity blackout soft pink adds a gentle touch to your interiors that allows you to transform the look and feel of any room your heart desires. It's all about achieving natural balance so that you can take your decor any which way you please, so go out there and do it. If you want to discover just what you can do with that awkward guest bedroom, soft pink provides the ideal starting point.

products.title: Origin (Blackout), Flamingo - Roller Blind
products.description: The flamingo from the origin (blackout) has nothing if not attitude. This funky fuchsia shade is bold and daring, perfect for brightening up your home. Don't forget though, this blind is more than just good-looking; it's also practical, hardwearing, and easy-to-use. This hot pink shade will sit perfectly against dark purples, pale pinks, or stark whites, and is perfect for a funky bedroom, bright home office, or accented hallway.

products.title: Stripy (Blackout), Pink - Roller Blind
products.description: The stripy pink is a fun way to inject some funky colour and style into any room. But it's far from style over substance; with its high quality blackout material, this blind is the perfect way to ensure a great night's sleep. Why not add the stripy pink to a child's or guest bedroom to give the room a fresh range of vivid colours at minimal cost and effort. Or perhaps add a sense of flair to the kitchen whilst you prepare some of your favourite dishes.
